QuestData.Title: That Guy in the Costume
QuestData.Description:
Aye, when we were out huntin' on the coast, we ran into this ridiculous lad in in a costume. He says he's tryin ta blend in with the murlocs... but I'm pretty sure he's just not right in the head.
One of ours stayed behind to keep an eye on him when we headed back to camp... mind checkin' it out?
Ye can ask Tamara over there for a ride.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Tamara and fly to Shipwreck Cove.
QuestData.RewardText: Hello, adventurer! Here to help me and Murky out?
